EmailTemplate.name: Community Edition Download.license email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Welcome to VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for your interest in VMTurbo Operations Manager Community Edition. Getting started with this solution is just a few clicks (and less than 30 minutes) away. Visit VMTurbo’s website to initiate your download <http://www.vmturbo.com/getting-started/>.
Use your license key <http://go.vmturbo.com/CommunityEditionDownload_License14978235.html> to enable the features in the Community Edition. Once you’ve installed and configured the VMTurbo appliance in your environment, check out the evaluation resources <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/evaluation-resource-center/> available and, of course, you can always reach support <http://support.vmturbo.com/home> for assistance.
Finally, if you have a few minutes (specifically, 2 minutes and 24 seconds), we invite you to view a fun introductory video <http://www.vmturbo.com/vmtvideo/> about VMTurbo. We look forward to working with you.
-The VMTurbo Team Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
